page.title: 05Housing In North Abingdon
page.content: About one third of our D-Block has housing built on it but very little was built before 1945.Most old houses were made of stone.Modern ones are mostly brick.Peachcroft estate(1965-1975)has 1070 units.Dunmore Farm estate (1965- 1975) has 250 units. Shippon village (1750-1960) has 208 units.R.A.F Abingdon (1945-1970) has 80 units. Sunningwel Village(1750-1970)has 80 units.Northcourt estate (1700-1960) has 560 units.Fitzharrys estate (1950- 1960)has 350 units(mostly terraced). Radley Green estate(1970-1975) has 375 units.Appleford Drive(1955-1975) has 420 units.Norman Avenue (1930-1960) has 55 units.Wildmoor (1950-1965) has 400 units.Whitecross(1925-1940) has 190 units.Sugworth Lane(1930-1955) has 30 units.Radley Road(1930-1975) has 130 units.
